TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileSystemSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity
Public MustInherit Class FileSystemSecurity Inherits NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示文件或目录的访问控制和审核安全。

span.span: Represents the access control and audit security for a file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 和类的基类。 The class is the base class for the and classes. 这些类表示系统文件或目录的所有访问权限, 并定义如何审核访问尝试。These classes represent all of the access rights for a system file or directory and define how access attempts are audited. 类将访问权限和审核权限表示为一组规则。The class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules. 每个访问规则由一个对象表示, 而每个审核规则由一个对象表示。Each access rule is represented by a object, while each audit rule is represented by a object. 类是基础 Microsoft Windows 文件安全系统的抽象。The class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system. 在此系统中, 每个文件或目录都有一个自定义访问控制列表 (DACL), 该列表控制对文件或目录的访问, 以及一个系统访问控制列表 (SACL), 后者指定审核的访问控制尝试。In this system, each file or directory has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the file or directory, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited. 和类是包含 dacl 和 sacl 的访问控制项 (ace) 的抽象。The and classes are abstractions of access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs. 类隐藏了 dacl 和 sacl 的许多详细信息; 不必担心 ACE 顺序或 null dacl。The class hides many of details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS. 若要将新的或更改的访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加和删除文件中的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类用于表示访问规则的枚举。

span.span: Gets the enumeration that the class uses to represent access rights.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示 枚举。

span.span: A object representing the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类的类将重写属性, 并返回它们用来表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 当使用包含多个类型的安全对象的数组或集合时, 请使用此属性来确定要用于每个安全对象的正确枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

summary.span: 使用指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志初始化 类的新实例，该实例表示指定用户的新的访问控制规则。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

returns.span: 表示指定用户的新访问控制规则的新的 对象，具有指定的访问权限、访问控制和标志。

span.span: A new object that represents a new access control rule for the specified user, with the specified access rights, access control, and flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建访问控制规则的建议方法是使用类的构造函数。The recommended way to create access control rules is to use the constructors of the class. 方法的返回类型是基类, 但返回值可以安全地强制转换为派生类。The return type of the method is the base class, , but the return value can be cast safely to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类的类将重写属性, 并返回用于表示访问规则的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rules. 当使用包含多个类型的安全对象的数组或集合时, 请使用此属性来确定要用于每个安全对象的正确访问规则类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct access rule type to use with each security object.

param.span: 一个 对象，表示要添加到文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 将指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限添加到当前文件或目录。

span.span: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新规则添加到对象中包含的规则列表。 The method adds a new rule to the list of rules contained within a object. 如果指定的规则已存在访问控制列表 (ACL), 该方法仍将添加规则, 但有一个例外 : 使用枚举值创建的对象将取代使用枚举值。If an access control list (ACL) already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule, with one exception: a object created using the enumeration value supersedes an object created using the enumeration value. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 当你在未设置标志的情况下添加访问规则时, 标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果以后在不指定标志的情况下删除该规则, 将自动删除该标志。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加和删除文件中的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新的审核规则添加到对象中包含的规则列表。 The method adds a new audit rule to the list of rules contained within a object. 如果指定的规则已存在审核规则, 则该方法仍将添加规则。If an audit rule already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将审核规则添加到文件中, 并使用方法从文件中移除审核规则。The following code example uses the method to add an audit rule to a file and uses the method to remove the audit rule from the file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RemoveAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed
Public Function RemoveAccessRule (rule As FileSystemAccessRule) As Boolean

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要从文件或目录中移除的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to remove from a file or directory.

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除所有匹配的允许或拒绝访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: Removes all matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permissions from the current file or directory.

returns.span: 如果访问规则已移除，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the access rule was removed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从当前 对象中移除所有匹配的访问规则或所有匹配的访问规则。 The method removes either all matching access rules or all matching access rules from the current object. 例如, 你可以使用此方法通过传递使用值、值和用户帐户创建的对象来删除用户的所有访问规则。For example, you can use this method to remove all access rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 如果执行此操作, 方法将删除任何指定值或值的拒绝规则。When you do this, the method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value. 若要将新的或更改的访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 当你在未设置标志的情况下添加访问规则时, 标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果以后在不指定标志的情况下删除该规则, 将自动删除该标志。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加和删除文件中的访问控制列表 (ACL) 项。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control list (ACL) entry from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除指定用户的所有访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。The method removes all access control list (ACL) permissions for the specified user. 方法将忽略对象中除用户帐户之外的所有值。The method ignores all values in the object except the user account. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 当你在未设置标志的情况下添加访问规则时, 标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果以后在不指定标志的情况下删除该规则, 将自动删除该标志。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除单个匹配的允许或拒绝访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: Removes a single matching allow or deny access control list (ACL) permission from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从当前 对象中移除指定的访问规则或指定的匹配访问规则。 The method removes the specified access rule or the specified matching access rule from the current object. 例如, 你可以使用此方法通过传递使用值、值和用户帐户创建的对象, 为用户删除指定的访问规则。For example, you can use this method to remove a specified access rule for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 执行此操作时, 方法只删除指定值的拒绝规则。When you do this, the method removes only the deny rule that specifies the value. 它不会删除任何指定值的拒绝规则。It does not remove any deny rules that specify the value. 若要将新的或更改的访问控制列表 (ACL) 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed access control list (ACL) information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method. 当你在未设置标志的情况下添加访问规则时, 标志将自动添加到你的规则。When you add an access rule without setting the flag, the flag will be automatically added to your rule. 如果以后在不指定标志的情况下删除该规则, 将自动删除该标志。If you remove the rule later without specifying the flag, the flag will automatically be removed.

returns.span: 如果审核规则已移除，则为 ；否则为

span.span: if the audit rule was removed; otherwise,

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从当前 对象中移除所有匹配的审核规则或所有匹配的审核规则。 The method removes either all matching audit rules or all matching audit rules from the current object. 例如, 你可以使用此方法通过传递使用值、值和用户帐户创建的对象来删除用户的所有审核规则。For example, you can use this method to remove all audit rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 如果执行此操作, 方法将删除任何指定值或值的拒绝规则。When you do this, the method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将审核规则添加到文件中, 并使用方法从文件中移除审核规则。The following code example uses the method to add an audit rule to a file and uses the method to remove the audit rule from the file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-csharp[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleAll(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，该对象指定应该从文件或目录删除其审核规则的用户。

span.span: A object that specifies a user whose audit rules should be removed from a file or directory.

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除指定用户的所有审核规则。

span.span: Removes all audit rules for the specified user from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除指定用户的所有审核规则。The method removes all audit rules for the specified user. 它忽略对象中除用户帐户之外的所有值。It ignores all values in the object except the user account.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAuditRuleSpecific(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAuditRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要从文件或目录移除的审核规则。

span.span: A object that represents an audit rule to remove from a file or directory.

summary.span: 从当前文件或目录移除单个匹配的允许或拒绝审核规则。

span.span: Removes a single matching allow or deny audit rule from the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从当前 对象中删除指定的匹配审核规则或指定的匹配审核规则。 The method removes the specified matching audit rule or the specified matching audit rule from the current object. 例如, 你可以使用此方法通过传递使用值、值和用户帐户创建的对象来删除用户的指定审核规则。For example, you can use this method to remove a specified audit rule for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 执行此操作时, 方法只删除指定值的拒绝规则。When you do this, the method removes only a deny rule that specifies the value. 它不会删除任何指定值的拒绝规则。It does not remove any deny rules that specify the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要添加到文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to add to a file or directory.

summary.span: 将指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限添加到当前文件或目录，并移除所有匹配的 ACL 权限。

span.span: Adds the specified access control list (ACL) permission to the current file or directory and removes all matching ACL permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 规则或覆盖`rule`与参数匹配的所有相同 ACL 规则。 The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the `rule` parameter. 例如, 如果`rule`参数指定了一个值, 并且该方法找到了指定该值的相同 ACL 规则, 则将覆盖相同的规则。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果该方法找到指定值的相同 ACL 规则, 则相同的规则也会被覆盖。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will also be overwritten. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method.

param.name: rule
param.span: 一个 对象，表示要为文件或目录设置的访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: A object that represents an access control list (ACL) permission to set for a file or directory.

summary.span: 设置当前文件或目录的指定访问控制列表 (ACL) 权限。

span.span: Sets the specified access control list (ACL) permission for the current file or directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 规则或覆盖与`rule`参数的值匹配的所有相同 ACL 规则。 The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如, 如果`rule`参数指定了一个值, 并且该方法找到了指定该值的相同 ACL 规则, 则将覆盖相同的规则。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法找到指定值的相同 ACL 规则, 则不会覆盖相同的规则。 If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到文件中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a file, use the or method. 若要将新的或更改的 ACL 信息保存到目录中 , 请使用或方法。To persist new or changed ACL information to a directory, use the or method. 若要从文件中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a file, use the or method. 若要从目录中检索 ACL 信息, 请使用或方法。To retrieve ACL information from a directory, use the or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的审核规则或覆盖与`rule`参数的值匹配的任何相同的审核规则。 The method adds the specified audit rule or overwrites any identical audit rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如, 如果`rule`参数指定一个值, 并且该方法找到指定该值的相同审核规则, 则将覆盖相同的规则。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果该方法找到指定值的相同审核规则, 则不会覆盖相同的规则。If the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.
